name: Escape The Cauldron
description:
You wake up in a gingerbread house sitting in a cauldron. To escape the witch who put you here you must solve puzzles to collect keys and unlock doors. Will you escape or become someones next dinner?

Dominic Lincourt - Producer

Travis Kosier - Co-Producer and Lead Programmer

Erica M. Winfrey - Lead Artist

Emily Rose - Artist

Ricardo Gonzales - Sound Engineer

Jhon Vergara - Programmer

Nicholas Miceli - Programmer

Derrick Roman - Programmer

Gabe M. - Artist
